info.browsehappy: Our website has detected that you are using a outdated browser or which we don't support, the browser will prevent you from accessing certain features. we recommend you to upgrade your browser
info.authenticated:
If you want to sign in, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.not_match: The password and its confirmation do not match!
error.length: This field's length should be {{length}} character
error.user_exists: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.
error.email_exists: E-mail is already in use! Please choose another one.
error.min: This field value cannot be lower than {{length}}
error.max: This field value cannot be higher than {{length}}
error.gsm: GSM should start with 5 and its length should be 10
error.phone_number_length: Number should be {{length}} digits include zero.
error.form_invalid: The form has some errors, please check it and try again
error.username_pattern: Should contain just lowercase english letters, numbers and dash (-) and dot (.)
error.password:
Should contain at least 1 number.
Should contain both lowercase and uppercase characters.
Should contain at least 1 special character from list: ! @ # $ % * ( ) _ + ^ &.
Sample password: Abc123! , 123!Abc, 123Abc! ,...
error.equal_to: This field value must match previous entry.
error.concurrencyFailure: System error ( syserr-01 ), please contact your system administrator
error.accessDenied: You are not authorized to access this part, please contact your system administrator
error.validation: There are some validation errors, please check and correct them
error.method_not_supported: System error ( syserr-02 ), please contact your system administrator
error.internal_server_error: System error ( syserr-03 ), please contact your system administrator
error.notFound: System error ( syserr-04 ), please contact your system administrator
error.unsupported_operation: This operation is not supported for this resource
error.illegal_state: Resource is not in state to fullfill this operation
error.common_message_prod: System Error {{spanID}},{{traceID}} please contact your system administrator.
error.common_message_local: System Error {{spanID}},{{traceID}} {{cause}} {{exception}} please contact your system administrator.
